code: import*as NavigationActions from"../NavigationActions";import invariant from"../utils/invariant";var getNavigationActionCreators=function getNavigationActionCreators(route){return{goBack:function goBack(key){var actualizedKey=key;if(key===undefined&&route.key){invariant(typeof route.key==='string','key should be a string');actualizedKey=route.key;}return NavigationActions.back({key:actualizedKey});},navigate:function navigate(navigateTo,params,action){if(typeof navigateTo==='string'){return NavigationActions.navigate({routeName:navigateTo,params:params,action:action});}invariant(typeof navigateTo==='object','Must navigateTo an object or a string');invariant(params==null,'Params must not be provided to .navigate() when specifying an object');invariant(action==null,'Child action must not be provided to .navigate() when specifying an object');return NavigationActions.navigate(navigateTo);},setParams:function setParams(params){invariant(route.key&&typeof route.key==='string','setParams cannot be called by root navigator');return NavigationActions.setParams({params:params,key:route.key});}};};export default getNavigationActionCreators;
